skilllist.skilldesc: Karrie's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Lightwheel Mark</font> on hit. Once a target has 5 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Lightwheel Marks</font>, the marks will turn into a lightwheel, dealing <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> equal to 5<font color="fba51f"> (+1% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of the target's Max HP to them (only up to 300 damage against Creeps).

Karrie releases a sphere of surging energy in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path. The sphere will stop upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its max travel distance, continuously dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 80% for 1s.

Karrie dashes in the target direction while throwing a lightwheel at the nearest enemy, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and applying a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Lightwheel Mark</font> on them.

When in <font color="a6aafb">Dual Wield</font> state, Karrie throws two lightwheels instead.

Karrie enters <font color="a6aafb">Dual Wield</font> state for 10s, during which she gains 20% Movement Speed and throws two lightwheels with each Basic Attack, each dealing 40<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and inheriting a portion of Attack Effects.

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Balanced Attack Speed, offense & defense, with Ultimate for burst.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After every <Num1> separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by <%Num2> for <Num3>s.########[8098ab]A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

recommendmasterplan.name: MELONN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc:
Assassins like Saber and Aamon who can eliminate 
ranged threats so Karrie can focus the frontline.

strong.desc: Tanks such as Tigreal and Fredrinn that take more damage from her HP percent attacks.

weak.desc: Long range heroes such as Xavier, Layla and Nana due to Karrie's medium range.
